dev-master.name: michaelhue/li3_gravatar
dev-master.description: The Lithium Gravatar plugin (Li3 Gravatar) allows you to interact with Gravatar (http://gravatar.com) images and profiles. It provides a helper for displaying Gravatars and a model for requesting user profiles from Gravatar.

suggest.UnionOfRAD\/lithium: Lithium is required for this plugin.
